name: Age Of Revolution
description:
Age Of Revolution is a 2D Shooter,  Survival, and Action game based on a distant future. The objective is simple,  you are a Prospector and your goal is to survive as long as possible and kill as many enemy Cyborgs as possible. Do you have what it takes to survive the apocalypse and bring back the planet as it was before!!

Good Luck Prospector.

Controls:
W, A, S, D for movement, Use the mouse cursor to aim and left mouse-click to shoot
